text:
#GeriMedRisk is pleased to have @DavidJuurlink of @sunnybrook presenting May 19, 2020 at Noon on #hydroxychloroquine, #chloroquine and #azithromycine in a special GeriMedRisk #COVID19 Safe Prescribing rounds. Register here to join:
